# Pasteboard Writing Options

**API Collection**

Constant to specify options for writing to a pasteboard, used by [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPasteboardWriting/writingOptions(forType:pasteboard:)].

## Constants

- **promised**: Data for a type with this option is promised, not immediately written.

## Constants

- **NSPasteboard.WritingOptions**: Type to specify options for writing to a pasteboard.

items.description: Data for a type with this option is promised, not immediately written.
items.name: promised

items.description: Type to specify options for writing to a pasteboard.
